tweets.text:
Introducing slide-deck skill üé®

  Turn any article or content into professional slide decks with AI-generated images.

  15 styles to choose from:
  ‚Ä¢ blueprint - technical diagrams
  ‚Ä¢ sketch-notes - hand-drawn feel
  ‚Ä¢ corporate - investor-ready
  ‚Ä¢ pixel-art - retro gaming vibes
  ‚Ä¢ watercolor - artistic warmth
  ...and 10 more

  Just run /baoyu-slide-deck https://t.co/Mr6DFuOZiM or pdf and get:
  ‚úì Auto-generated outline
  ‚úì Individual slide images
  ‚úì Merged PPTX ready to share

  Install: npx add-skill jimliu/baoyu-skills

  https://t.co/pRDqxdiSrH

As shown, the generated slides can be exported as a PPTX file. Each slide retains the original image prompt, allowing you to modify the text and regenerate the slide at any time while maintaining a consistent style. https://t.co/qCmAXz6CGx
